text: Khorne's Rain of Blades
Fragments of failed warriors' weapons fall from the heavens, vanishing alongside their masters on unknown battlefields.
Skull Throne's Decree
When the seas turn to blood and mountains to skull piles, our glory will be revealed.
Skullfire Breath
Dark Prince! Witness the fate of your pitiful servants—now reduced to tools for our glorious slaughter!
Blade Chain Tempest
With a distant gesture, Khorne's endless chains engulf cowardly fliers, shredding their wings and convictions.
Skull-Cleaving Axe of Fury
No battlements, flesh mounds, or metal walls can withstand the fury manifested by Khorne's bloodstained hand!
Song of Skulls
This is our hunting ground, teeming with prey awaiting slaughter—we are the singers of bloody odes!
Khorne's Stomp
Our brutality spares neither friend nor foe—the weak are unworthy of fighting for Khorne’s glory!
Brass Citadel
An endless torrent of war’s blood opens the gates to Khorne’s realm, drawing all life into the Brass Citadel for Khorne's trials.
Khorne's Glance
Even the slightest glance strikes fear into enemies, as if their souls are wrenched from their bodies.
Blood Tornado
Fanatical chants of Khorne’s greatness summon a blood-fueled storm, annihilating all who stand in its path.
Infernal Chains
Chains of brass emerge from the Inferno, binding cowards’ ankles and shrouding their vision of the sky.
Skull-Crushing Blow
A giant bloodstained hand appears over Khorne’s foes, smashing their skulls into fragments with a single blow.
Weak Blood Fountain
The shattered skulls of Tzeentch’s servants explode, showing those fools who meddle with winds of magic their inevitable fate.
Bloodmark Mist
Followers summon Khorne's vast sigil, bolstering their allies’ resilience and driving them to bring death and ruin to their foes.
Bloodstained Lash
Killing a servant of Khorne is never a mistake—but if you do, rejoice in spreading the glory of the Blood God.
Brass Canopy
Molten brass flows across the heavens, disrupting the balance of magical storms—only Khorne's chosen can sense its presence.
